Package org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge

Classes for Generic protocol-independent interactions to IO-homecontrolled devices via the Velux gateway.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VeluxBridgeInstance
    This interface is implemented by classes that deal with a specific Velux bridge and its configuration.
    VeluxBridgeProvider
    This interface is implemented by classes that provide general communication with the Velux bridge.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    VeluxBridge
    2nd Level I/O interface towards the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeActuators
    The VeluxBridgeActuators represents a complete set of transactions for retrieving of any available products into a structure VeluxBridgeActuators.channel defined on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeDetectProducts
    The VeluxBridgeDetectProducts represents a complete set of transactions for temporary activation of device detection mode on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeDeviceCheckLostNodes
    The VeluxBridgeDeviceCheckLostNodes represents a complete set of transactions for querying device status on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeDeviceStatus
    The VeluxBridgeDeviceStatus represents a complete set of transactions for querying device status on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeGetFirmware
    The VeluxBridgeGetFirmware represents a complete set of transactions for retrieving of firmware version string on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeGetHouseStatus
    The VeluxBridgeGetHouseStatus represents a complete set of transactions for receiving the current state by the House Status Monitor on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeGetLimitation
    The VeluxBridgeGetLimitation represents a complete set of transactions for retrieval of the limitation of an actuator defined on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeLANConfig
    The VeluxBridgeLANConfig represents a complete set of transactions for retrieving the network configuration of the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeRunProductCommand
    The VeluxBridgeRunProductCommand represents a complete set of transactions for executing a scene defined on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeRunScene
    The VeluxBridgeRunScene represents a complete set of transactions for executing a scene defined on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeScenes
    The VeluxBridgeScenes represents a complete set of transactions for retrieving of any available scenes into a structure VeluxExistingScenes defined on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeSetHouseStatusMonitor
    The VeluxBridgeSetHouseStatusMonitor represents a complete set of transactions for modifying the service state of the House Status Monitor on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeSetLimitation
    The VeluxBridgeSetLimitation represents a complete set of transactions for modifying the limitation of an actuator defined on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeSetSceneVelocity
    The VeluxBridgeSetSceneVelocity represents a complete set of transactions for modifying the silent-mode of a scene defined on the Velux bridge.
    VeluxBridgeWLANConfig
    The VeluxBridgeWLANConfig represents a complete set of transactions for retrieving the wireless network configuration of the Velux bridge.

Package org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge Description

Classes for Generic protocol-independent interactions to IO-homecontrolled devices via the Velux gateway. This layer is responsible for the transformation of openHAB "objects" into Velux "object" and vice versa.
Author:
Guenther Schreiner - Initial contribution
